document_data.name: Pai'Na
document_data.class2e: [[Druid]]<ref group="note">In dialogue that was cut from [[Baldur's Gate II: Shadows of Amn|the game's]] final release, Pai'Na was said to be a [[hivemaster]].
document_data.mainbody:
'''Pai'Na''' was a [[spider]]-worshiping [[druid]] who lived beneath the city of [[Athkatla]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''You will fall here, interloper! I did not build this sanctuary for you to tear it down in passing! Feel the wrath of the arachnids, of the divine eight-legged!''|Pai'Na}}
document_data.Description: Pai'Na dwelled within a massive spider nest that she had built with the tomb complex beneath the city's [[Athkatla/Grave District|Grave District]]. She was protected by a number of [[giant spider]]s, including a [[wraith spider]] and a [[sword spider]].
document_data.Activities: Within her lair, Pai'Na kept a number of human bodies that were filled with spiders. At her command the spiders would burst forth and swarm at her direction.
document_data.Possessions: She was in the possession of an ovoid, ''[[pale green ioun stone]]'' and the ''[[black spider figurine]]'' that allowed foe summoning forth a semi-intelligent spider named [[Kitthix]].
